00206 #define RKH_CREATE_HSM( sm_t, name, id, ppty, is, ia, hd )              \
00207                                                                         \
00208     static rkhrom ROMRKH_T rs_##name = mkrrkh( id,ppty,name,is,ia );    \
00209                 static sm_t s_##name = mkrkh( &rs_##name,is,hd );       \
00210                 RKH_T * const name = ( RKH_T* )&s_##name
00211

00232 #define RKH_CREATE_COMP_STATE( name,id,en,ex,parent,defchild,history )  \
00233                                                                         \
00234                                 extern rkhrom RKHTR_T name##_trtbl[];   \
00235                                                                         \
00236                                 rkhrom RKHSREG_T name =                 \
00237                                 {                                       \
00238                                     mkbase(RKH_COMPOSITE,id,name),      \
00239                                     mkcomp(en,ex,parent,name,           \
00240                                                 defchild,history)       \
00241                                 }
00242

00270                                                                         \
00271                                 extern rkhrom RKHTR_T name##_trtbl[];   \
00272                                                                         \
00273                                 rkhrom RKHSREG_T name =                 \
00274                                 {                                       \
00275                                     mkbase(RKH_BASIC,id,name),          \
00276                                     mkbasic(en,ex,parent,name,prepro)   \
00277                                 }

00303                                                                         \
00304                                 extern rkhrom RKHTR_T name##_trtbl[];   \
00305                                                                         \
00306                                 rkhrom RKHSCOND_T name =                \
00307                                 {                                       \

00309                                     name##_trtbl                        \
00310                                 }

00357 #define RKH_CREATE_DEEP_HISTORY_STATE( name,id,parent )                 \
00358                                                                         \
00359                                 static rkhrom RKHSREG_T *ram##name;     \
00360                                                                         \
00361                                 rkhrom RKHSHIST_T name =                \
00362                                 {                                       \
00363                                     mkbase(RKH_DHISTORY,id,name),       \
00364                                     parent,&ram##name                   \
00365                                 }
